text: Enka is a type of music from Japan that resembles traditional Japanese music. Modern Enka is a more recent form, but more traditional in style.Christine Reiko Yano. Tears of Longing: Nostalgia and the Nation in Japanese Popular Song. Google Books. via Harvard Univ Asia Center. 2003. 42. Modern enka, as growing in the postwar era, is a form of sentimental ballad music. ==References== Category:Japanese music
title: Enka
